import React from 'react'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import CardDeck from 'react-bootstrap/CardDeck' import '../Components/Portfolio.css'; import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive' function MediaQuery() { const isDesktopOrLaptop = useMediaQuery({ query: '(min-device-width: 1224px)' }) const isBigScreen = useMediaQuery({ query: '(min-device-width: 1824px)' }) const isTabletOrMobile = useMediaQuery({ query: '(max-width: 1224px)' }) const isTabletOrMobileDevice = useMediaQuery({ query: '(max-device-width: 1224px)' }) const isPortrait = useMediaQuery({ query: '(orientation: portrait)' }) const isRetina = useMediaQuery({ query: '(min-resolution: 2dppx)' }) function Portfolio() { return (
